data.message: MGK is my rapper. We still love ur music Em but I have an always be a Trump Supporter. No one tells a grown up who they can n cannot like. Keep trying to get those records sales though. Way to be dividing for those who cannot think 4 themselves though

replies.message:
You like trump so that clearly says alot about how you can't think for yourself. If you vote for either main parties you are brainwashed. Look how fast you and others came to cry and defend trump it's insane how loyal you pets are to him. 

If anyone says shit about trump you people are always quick to drop whatever you are doing and make sure to come crying to the comments.

I don't need anyone to tell me how to think. That is why I voted the way I did but that is off the topic of the post.  I am not defending anyone. Who is crying?? Did I bash Em?? No I am a fan even though he said to Fuck off we r not his fans if we support Trump. I have been a Trump supporter since 88. What is with all the name calling?? Calm down girl. Sounds like u r tired n need to go to bed.
Lmao racist trump supporters fuck you like Eminem said
Trump supporter since 1988? So you was just off supporting a random billionaire for shits and giggles? Your logic is so flaw it hurts.

How is anybody defending trump here, I don't think any of us really care that he dissed trump (as overplayed as it is these days) but Em told half of his fan base to fuck off... Kinda disappointing as you would imagine, to have supported somebody for so long to have them tell you to fuck off

How r we racist?? What did I say that was racist?? I enjoy Em's music I just don't appreciate after loving his music to ne told to Fuck off n thay we r not fans. Like I said I am a fan of his but I can decide to like other things n people even if we have different views that is what makes this country great. The freedom to have that choicen not to be forced to do as others say.

Wait 1st off dummy, he dont need record sales! He obviously knew the outcome of his decision to do said bashing knowing dam well hes droppn his new album. Fact, Trumps a piece of shit! Thats a fact! 2nd your right, everybodys untitled to there own opinion. 3rd, MGK? Really, guys garbage....... But thats just that, my opinion! Along wit thinking your garbage!     Jus sayn"      Trump hater out, ✌

Ems a realist, fans? He never asked 4 fans! He didn't say, hey im about this and u gotta b too? Did he? Wtf. U either like him or not! Thats your decision. I personally think the people that are choosing to say shit after that cypher, about Em are confused at what they like. St8 up, fuckn kiddn me. Go follow someone else or i know how bout dont follow anybody at all. B your own leader!!!

Again you cannot have a debate w out name calling.  U r getting so angry. I am a fan of Em but I too can have an opinion on what music I like too w out disrespecting others. I guess he just makes music for fun huh??
Not supporting as a candidate back then was he in politics no, but admired him as a businessman.
Hahaha "Trump's a piece of shit! That's a fact!" you don't even know what facts are you nitwit
Fuck You - Courtesy of Slim Shady
@ Rob agree w you. I was saying just cause I support Trump love Em's music so he doesn't want us as fans. That is fine not gonna lose any sleep but will still listen to his music
He's not telling you who to like. He's telling you he hates you so much he doesn't want your business.
@Shane did u listen to his performance?? In his lyrics he said if u cannot decide u can Fuck off. U r not his fans. That is what this post is about. Wow!!
Lmao MGK is no fan of Trump either... Pretty sure Kells would say the same..🖕 however Kells has deep admiration for Em, even tho he has been shaded by Em..

You like the fact that Trump can have a nuclear war and you support that I think your fucking cray and join ISIS that’s how bad trump is do you know what will happen to the world if that war does happen you won’t be living   I heard Americans are cray and you just proving that point support your crazy bitch of a government because you should be tied up with the first bomb he fires dickhead

Mark ur response is nonsense. Maybe learn to speak proper ur post was sad.   No one wants a nuclear war. Other countries not just the US can declare war. The plan is to stop Korea. Join ISIS what r u refering too??  Real intelligent. Why r u all going political on this post??
Fuck Trump
Former chef at Mc Donalds that is just sad n silly
^^Saw that haha is funny even if it is not real
For every 1 he lost, he gained 2 more. Adios, Tania!
